title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Boeing 247D - fuel system
description:
In this video we are going to have a look at how you can monitor the fuel system of the Boeing 247D. Be aware that initially it will feel unnatural to see the fuel gauges set to 0 but after watching this video you will know how to use them useful during your flights with the Boeing 247D.
